description: This file defines functions related to interacting with a blockchain escrow contract, including a method to send deposits to the escrow contract using ethers.js.

methods.name: sendEscrowDeposit({ signer, matchId, amountEth, escrowAddress = process.env.REACT_APP_ESCROW_ADDRESS, escrowAbi = DEFAULT_ESCROW_ABI })
methods.description: Asynchronously sends an escrow deposit transaction to a specified contract address, handling input validation and transaction execution via ethers.js.
